metadata.title: CVE-2020-0336 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In SurfaceFlinger, there is possible memory corruption due to typeconfusion. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with Systemexecution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11Android ID: A-153467444

criterions.comment: android package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
